mapper.sql: SELECT at_no, att.s_id, the_time, att.as_no, ass.as_status, ccc.c_no, ccc.c_name, sg.gd_name, sss.s_name FROM attendance att inner join student sss on sss.s_id = att.s_id inner join student_grade sg on sss.gd_no = sg.gd_no inner join attendance_status ass on att.as_no = ass.as_no left outer join course_register cr on att.s_id = reg_s_id left outer join course ccc on ccc.c_no = cr.reg_c_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance (s_id, the_time, as_no) VALUES(#{student.sId}, current_timestamp, #{attendanceStatus.asNo})
INSERT INTO attendance (s_id, the_time, as_no) VALUES(#{sId}, current_date, 1)
mapper.select: where att.s_id = #{sId} and date_format(att.the_time, '%Y-%m') = #{month} order by att.the_time desc

select ifnull((select 1 from attendance a2 where a2.s_id=#{sId} and date(a2.the_time)=current_date
and a2.as_no between 2 and 3
and a2.as_no between 4 and 5
),0)
select ifnull((select min(t.tt_starttime) from course_register cr inner join timetable t on cr.reg_c_no = t.c_no where t.tt_day = 1 and cr.reg_s_id=#{sId} and cr.reg_month = #{month}), 0)
select count(a.at_no) from attendance a left outer join attendance a2 on Date(a.the_time) = Date(a2.the_time) and a.at_no != a2.at_no and a.s_id = a2.s_id
select * from attendance att inner join attendance_status ass on att.as_no = ass.as_no where date(att.the_time) = date(#{curDate}) order by att.the_time
